contents.text: Thank you for calling Crunchyroll, your San Francisco–based destination for legal anime streaming and simulcasts.
To manage your subscription or account, press 1.
Press 1 for new subscriptions and plan options.
Thank you for your interest in Crunchyroll memberships; please hold while we connect you to a subscription specialist.

navigationGoals: Switch my account to an annual Premium membership plan.
Ask about signing up for a new Crunchyroll membership using any available veteran discount
I want to provision a new Premium subscription tier with multi-stream support.
I want to start a new Crunchyroll membership and pick the right plan.
Compare membership tiers and inquire about a student discount for a new subscription

contents.text: Press 2 for billing inquiries or account changes.
Please hold while we transfer you to our billing and account support team.

navigationGoals: Update my credit card on file for my subscription.
Resolve an unexpected billing charge and update my payment method
I need to update my payment method and reconcile an unexpected invoice charge.
I need to update my payment information and review a recent charge.
Update my billing details and replace the credit card on file

contents.text: For technical support and streaming assistance, press 2.
Press 1 for streaming quality or playback issues.
We are connecting you to a technical support agent for streaming issues; please hold.

navigationGoals: Resolve buffering and low-quality playback on my stream.
Fix constant buffering and poor playback quality when streaming anime
I’m experiencing adaptive-bitrate drops at 1080p and need streaming performance diagnostics.
My anime keeps buffering and I need help fixing the streaming quality.
Troubleshoot frequent buffering and poor playback on my laptop

contents.text: Press 2 for device compatibility and app troubleshooting.
Please hold while we transfer you to our device support team.

navigationGoals: Fix the Crunchyroll app error on my smart TV.
Get help installing and troubleshooting the Crunchyroll app on my new TV device
My Smart TV app crashes on launch with a compatibility error—I need device troubleshooting.
I can’t get the Crunchyroll app to work on my TV and need device troubleshooting.
Get assistance installing and launching the Crunchyroll app on my smart TV
